person.content:

Paragraph: From Tuesday , the full assembly of the Senate will start its examination of the financial package .

Let's think step by step.

| Person |
| --- |
| the full assembly of the Senate |

Here, I have identified "the full assembly of the Senate" as the "Person" entity in the paragraph. This is because an assembly refers to a group of people who gather to make decisions or discuss matters. In this case, the assembly is of the Senate, which is a group of elected officials who come together to form a legislative body. Therefore, it is appropriate to consider "the full assembly of the Senate" as a single entity representing a group of people.
